channel.title: Free Ka Gyan on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in Free Ka Gyan on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: How to Learn
item.description: If you search the web for how to learn something, you will surely get a bunch of techniques that would help you to remember something but that is not the learning I am talking about, that is in a sense, a kind of memorization.

item.title: Languages are just tools, you idiot
item.description: Note: Don’t take the title onto your ego For sake of clarity, I would like to make some terms used in the post clear, it may mean something other to you but for the simplicity of the post, I would be using them in a particular way:
